headline: Ohio, California governors place friendly wager ahead of Super Bowl
author: WLWT Digital Staff
sentences:
DeWine has bet an assortment of Cincinnati food products including:
Steaks and seasoning from Jeff Ruby’s
Ribs from the Montgomery Inn
Goetta and bratwurst from Queen City Sausage
Potato Chips from Grippo’s
Chocolates from Maverick Chocolate Company, which has two locations in Cincinnati including in the historic Findlay Market
In addition, Ohio First Lady Fran DeWine will send her Bengals Buckeye Brownies if the wager is paid out.

“This friendly bet highlights some of Cincinnati’s most iconic foods and restaurants that everyone across Ohio and across the U.S.A. should know about and enjoy!”
Gov.
While many are placing their own bets on Sunday's Super Bowl game, the governors of Ohio and California are placing their own friendly wager.
Newsom has in turn wagered “some of California’s world-class agricultural offerings” for a Bengals win.
“Fran and I are so excited by the Bengals’ thrilling playoff run and Super Bowl appearance,” said Gov.
Gavin Newsom have placed a friendly wager ahead of the 2022 Super Bowl.
